text: “In a call with 120 House Democrats, Speaker Nancy Pelosi said she would reject any kind of classified briefing on the report and that he information must be provided to Congress in a way that would allow lawmakers to discuss it publicly”
author: JonLemire

text: ”Barr was on pace to release his first summary of Mueller’s findings on Sunday, people familiar with the process said”
author: JonLemire

text: Undeniably great golf pants from the once-rumored Senate candidate from Michigan
author: JonLemire

text: It has now been more than 24 hours since the president’s last tweet
author: JonLemire

text:
Wearing a black puffer coat, the woman carried a manila envelope that held a single sheet of paper.

Without being noticed, she delivered to Congress the simple envelope that contained a monumental message: Robert Mueller’s investigation was over.
author: JonLemire

text:
Trump was already at his lush Palm Beach estate, a thousand miles from the White House, when the waiting game finally, mercifully, quietly ended.

Our look behind the scenes across Washington as Mueller concluded his probe that transfixed the nation: https://apnews.com/cad1b2eb4c944176bba5cc3fa53f8a2b …
author: JonLemire

text:
Once the news dropped, cable news stations splashed “Breaking News” chyrons across the television screens, and scores of elected officials weighed in. 

Trump huddled with his attorneys at Mar-a-Lago but, for the moment, held his tongue and Twitter feed. https://apnews.com/cad1b2eb4c944176bba5cc3fa53f8a2b …
author: JonLemire

text: “Twitter users killed time by musing about the special counsel as a man with a crippling case of writer’s block, just sitting at his computer with a spinning cursor over a blank document titled, simply, ‘The Mueller Report.’” https://apnews.com/cad1b2eb4c944176bba5cc3fa53f8a2b …
author: JonLemire

text:
Wearing a black puffer coat, the woman carried a manila envelope that held a single sheet of paper.

Without being noticed, she delivered to Congress the simple envelope that contained a monumental message: Robert Mueller’s investigation was over https://apnews.com/cad1b2eb4c944176bba5cc3fa53f8a2b …
author: JonLemire

text:
NEW: Speculation about its findings, and when they would be delivered, had consumed Washington for weeks.

Fittingly for Mueller, who never once spoke publicly about the probe, the investigation concluded in a by-the-book, under-the-radar manner. https://apnews.com/cad1b2eb4c944176bba5cc3fa53f8a2b …
author: JonLemire

author: JonLemire

author: JonLemire

text:
NEW @AP poll: About 6 in 10 Americans have at least some confidence in the fairness of the Mueller investigation, with 33 percent very confident.

Thirty-seven percent are not very or not at all confident in a fair investigation.
author: JonLemire

text: A well-deserved write-up of the great ⁦@WillieGeist⁩ despite the disappointing lack of ⁦@mikebarnicle⁩ reaction quotes

text: Perhaps no state has better illustrated Trump’s re-aligning effects than Ohio, where traditionally Democratic-leaning working-class voters have swung heavily toward the GOP, and moderate Republicans in populous suburban counties have shifted away from him
author: JonLemire

text: “One can buy Mueller paintings, prayer candles, valentines and ornaments. A necklace, earrings, keychains. A stuffed toy of Mueller in a Superman outfit, cross-stitch patterns, baby onesies — even an illustration of his haircut to hang on the wall”
author: JonLemire

text: If the report is underwhelming, Trump plans to complain about the probe’s cost and length, depict it as an attempt to obstruct his agenda and use it to attack the House Democrats' efforts to investigate him https://apnews.com/b9895c2a29924230b93a21d9b780047a?utm_medium=AP&utm_source=Twitter&utm_campaign=SocialFlow …
author: JonLemire

text: “Derek’s done a good job of pissing everyone off,” said a member of the team’s administration. “I’m sure the guys at MLB now are scratching their heads, thinking, ‘What the f–k did we do by selecting him?’”
author: JonLemire

text: Trump aides have, for weeks, encouraged the president to ignore George Conway. Those efforts proved unsuccessful
author: JonLemire

text: “While Trump’s base has long been suspicious of Mueller, the president’s team believes independents and moderate Democrats who backed him in the last election but have since soured may return to the fold if convinced he has been unfairly targeted” https://apnews.com/b9895c2a29924230b93a21d9b780047a?utm_medium=AP&utm_source=Twitter&utm_campaign=SocialFlow …
author: JonLemire

text: “Trump can say: Here is the report. I didn’t fire Mueller, I didn’t interfere with him. If you want to keep investigating me, it just shows that it is purely partisan.” https://apnews.com/b9895c2a29924230b93a21d9b780047a?utm_medium=AP&utm_source=Twitter&utm_campaign=SocialFlow …

text: “The idea of formal membership is a nonstarter in every dimension — the treaty doesn’t allow it, the Brazilians wouldn’t want it and the Europeans wouldn’t approve”
author: JonLemire

text:
One scenario would have recently seemed downright implausible:

The president will take the findings and run on them, rather than against them, by painting Mueller as an example of government overreach and himself as the victim who proved his innocence https://apnews.com/b9895c2a29924230b93a21d9b780047a …
author: JonLemire

text: In a striking role role reversal, some Republicans feel Mueller report may hand Trump a campaign weapon - while Democrats are now busy opening a broad array of investigations of Trump’s White House and business, ready to go further than the special counsel https://apnews.com/b9895c2a29924230b93a21d9b780047a …
author: JonLemire

text:
“A full-throated attack on the investigation, portraying it as a failed coup, could be the centerpiece of Trump rallies.

“The president’s campaign and outside groups will amplify the message, with the conservative media, acting as an echo chamber”
author: JonLemire

text:
NEW: No one knows what the Mueller report will say. 

But Trump World is growing confident it won’t contain a smoking gun - and is considering taking the potentially anticlimactic findings and weaponizing them against the president’s foes https://apnews.com/b9895c2a29924230b93a21d9b780047a …
author: JonLemire

text: “They’re always saying, ‘He’s brooding, he’s angry,’ and I’m not! You know, I know how life goes. I get life better than a lot of people. I mean, I just get it.”
author: JonLemire

text:
NEW: Trump had already long been under scrutiny for his responses to white nationalism.

Hours after being invoked by the gunman in the New Zealand mosque massacre, the president downplayed the threat posed by the racist movement https://apnews.com/a1fa7fd40d2a427fac6a04e0ba113f25 …
author: JonLemire

text:
“The difference between an insurgent, anti-establishment campaign and the reelection campaign of a sitting president is enormous”

“It's like the difference between a pirate ship and a oceanliner”
author: JonLemire
